charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1101_0100_:
While strolling through the city,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Erika looking
around in confusion and decided to say hello.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_0400_:
I am, actually...
I wanted to do some shopping,
but I seem to have lost my way.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_0600_:
Well, maybe...
I wanted to do some shopping,
but I seem to have lost my way.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_0700_: I was walking with my Vileplume at first...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_0800_:
but she kept getting farther and farther away
from me, and eventually we got separated.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0301_0900_: It seems she has a mind of her own.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_1000_:
Tee-hee! You may be right about that.
I find that part of her so adorable, though...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0302_1100_: Sounds like she’s a little impatient.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_1200_:
Tee-hee! You may be right about that.
I find that part of her so adorable, though...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1300_:
Oh dear... I’ve derailed the whole
conversation, haven’t I?
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1400_:
Vileplume and I were actually heading to
the flower shop.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1500_: I’m very fond of flower arranging, you see.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1600_:
And I heard that Pasio has all sorts of
flowers and plants imported from
all over the world.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1700_:
So I thought I’d try to visit the best flower shop
in the city.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1800_:
My dear Vileplume... I hope she made it
to the flower shop all right.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1900_:
Would it be too much if I asked you to
escort me to the flower shop now?
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_2100_:
Oh, thank you so much.
I really appreciate it.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_2300_:
Oh, thank you so much.
I really appreciate it.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_2400_: We seem to have arrived, but...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_2500_:
The shop is so big, and I don’t see
Vileplume anywhere.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0302_2800_: Do you know how we could find her?
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3000_: I know just the thing! I have an idea.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3100_:
Vileplume has a specific type of flower
that she really loves.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3200_:
If I can make an arrangement with those flowers
and some of the plants imported here to Pasio...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3300_:
maybe Vileplume will notice them and come right
to us.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3400_:
Vileplume really loves my
flower arrangements, you see.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3500_:
Sometimes, when I’m arranging the flowers,
Vileplume suddenly appears right next to
me without me realizing.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_3700_: Oh, thank you! I think it’s a good idea, too!
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_3900_:
Really? Well, hopefully you’ll see it
in just a few moments.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1101_4100_:
and after a few moments, a crowd started forming
around her, mesmerized by her skillful hands.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1101_4200_:
Suddenly, a pungent odor wafted through the
space, causing the enraptured audience to hold
their noses.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4300_:
Oh, thank goodness! You had me so
worried for a moment, Vileplume.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4400_:
But it looks like you did make it all the way
to the flower shop by yourself, didn’t you?
And without spreading any of your toxic pollen!
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4500_:
I should really thank you for all of
your help, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4600_:
If I hadn’t met you on the road, 
I would probably still be lost out there.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4700_:
And look—this shop has so many cute flowers.
I’m so glad you helped me find it.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4800_:
Now that I’m here, I think I’ll stock up on a bunch
of different flowers for my flower arranging.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4900_:
I’m sure I’ll be able to create something
simply lovely with them.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_5000_:
I promise to let you know as soon as it’s done,
all right?
